post.body: Thanks for following me. I am now also follow you and I look forward to your tweets.
re: poll, yes, raw eggs. How else do I make it or are you going to show us how on TV tomorrow?
great blog on Twitter, http://tinyurl.com/76vhr8, Coach. Great ideas and I am glad to be following you now.
maybe no one wants you to follow them LOL. Just kidding, had two follow clicks work for me just 5 minutes ago.
Good post re IDX. My pet peeve is descriptions that SHOUT at me about the house. Shouting does not excite me about it.
I have you on my prayer list for your treatment for tomorrow and looking forward to you feeling better.
thanks for following me Sharon and good to work with you at Domus!
thanks for following me. We're close enough to probably meet each other someday.
thanks for following me. I will look for more of your fun videos.
Whoops sorry, I clearly thought it was to borrow for a special occasion. Sorry.
Do you need just cameras or button pushers too? Either way, I can lend and/or help out depending on when.
Getting tweeted weather reports from all over the country this morning and I am getting ready to head for the beach :-)
GOOD MORNING - I would like to personally thank all of you, my personal therapists! http://tinyurl.com/925s2z
You can now release economic frustrations by play "Sock and Awe." http://www.sockandawe.com/
Just carved the turkey, yes 7:30 AM, after cooking until 2:00 AM for a Christmas party for this evening.
Just finished interviewing the owner of a pizzeria for an upcoming blog on what makes a good pizza. Owner insisted I eat some. Oh well, ok
#domus Hi there!
Getting ready for my Domus webinar ... boss!
Just found out my boss is monitoring my activities and performance on twitter. Must be careful :-)
Working on negotiation for home re-sale. Will have a sale today or keep looking.
